滘字的基本解释

滘
jiào
方言，指水相通处（多用于地名）：双滘圩（x?）；道滘（均在中国广东省）。

滘字的汉语字典释义

[①]［jiào］
方言。河道相通处。多用作地名。

Jiao
Basic explanation of words
Jiao
jiào
Dialect refers to the place where water is connected (mostly used for place names): Shuangjiaowei (x?); Daojiao (both in Guangdong Province, China).
Jiao
Chinese dictionary definition of words
[①]［jiào］
dialect. The place where the rivers intersect. Used mostly as a place name.
